mapper.insert: insert into smart_formaldehyde (f_id, f_time, f_value, f_level) values (#{fId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{fValue,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{fLevel,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select f_id, f_time, f_value, f_level from smart_formaldehyde
select * from smart_formaldehyde order by f_id desc limit 4 ;
